name: Real Estate Select Sector SPDR Fund
description: The Real Estate Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLRE) is an exchange-traded fund (ETF) that aims to provide investment results that correspond to the performance of the Real Estate Select Sector Index. This index includes companies that are primarily engaged in the ownership, operation, or development of real estate. Launched in 2015, XLRE provides investors with exposure to the real estate sector of the S&P 500, which includes Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs) and other real estate-related companies. The fund is designed to be a cost-effective way for investors to gain diversified exposure to the real estate market, which can be an important asset class for portfolio diversification. The fund offers a simple, transparent structure and is managed by State Street Global Advisors, one of the largest asset management firms in the world. With a focus on income generation and capital appreciation, XLRE is suitable for investors seeking to benefit from the potential for growth in the real estate sector, as well as those looking for income through dividends from REITs. The fund's holdings are diversified across various types of real estate, including residential, commercial, and industrial properties, which can help mitigate risk.

seo.meta_title: Real Estate Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLRE) | Investment in Real Estate
seo.meta_description: Invest in the Real Estate Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLRE) to gain exposure to the real estate sector of the S&P 500. Explore diverse holdings in REITs and real estate companies.

faq.question: What is XLRE?
faq.answer: XLRE is an exchange-traded fund that provides investment results corresponding to the performance of the Real Estate Select Sector Index.

faq.question: Who manages XLRE?
faq.answer: XLRE is managed by State Street Global Advisors.

faq.question: What type of companies does XLRE invest in?
faq.answer: XLRE primarily invests in Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs) and other real estate-related companies.

faq.question: What are the benefits of investing in XLRE?
faq.answer: Investing in XLRE provides exposure to the real estate sector, potential for income through dividends, and diversification within an investment portfolio.
